relevant_findings.general: Comfortable appearing, sitting up in bed, no distress.
relevant_findings.HEENT: Pupils equal and reactive, no scleral icterus or injection, moist mucous membranes.
relevant_findings.cardiac: S1/S2 regular with no obvious murmur, rub or S3/S4.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Significant TTP in LLQ, especially near drain. Drain site non-erythematous. Green purulent material in drain bulb and near drain insertion site.
relevant_findings.extremities: Mild edema in bilateral lower extremities.
relevant_findings.neurologic: A+Ox3, grossly normal strength and gait, conjugate gaze, appropriate affect.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Abdomen diffusely tender with no rebound or guarding. Drain bulb with purulent material, nonbloody. Skin surrounding the drain is nonerythematous with a small amount of pus present since 'day 1.'
